activities: Personal Information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. We collect information from patients, caregivers and healthcare professionals via surveys and other research techniques. We also collect information on our employees, potential recruits and clients, including those based in the EU, and that information is sometimes shared with our US office.
contactoff1: Adelphi Research by Design LLC trading as Adelphi Research
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We process personal data from market research subjects, employees, job applicants and clients. Some of the data will be manges manually.
recoursemech:
CASRO Safe Harbor Program operated by the Council of American Survey Research Organizations (CASRO); 
EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) for dispute resolution for HR data only
